title: African Burial Ground National Monument: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       African Burial Ground National Monument is located in an urban setting.  Be careful crossing busy streets. Watch your step on uneven surfaces. Guard your valuables. In an emergency, call 911.  To help protect park resources and ensure a safe and enjoyable visit for  everyone, please follow park rules and posted regulations.   Pets are not allowed within the outdoor memorial or indoor visitor center, unless a designated service animal. Please dispose of your garbage in trash containers prior to entering the outdoor memorial and indoor visitor center. Bicycles are not allowed within the outdoor memorial or indoor visitor center. All visitors must pass through airport-style security to enter the indoor visitor center within the Ted Weiss Federal Building.
